body_html:
@jamesr66a, @apaszke, this dependency on builtins causes issues if future is not installed. Can you add it to setup depedencies?

Successfully installed torch-nightly-1.0.0.dev20181017

    import torch.jit
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/jit/__init__.py", line 10, in <module>
    import builtins
ImportError: No module named builtins
>>>

body:
@jamesr66a, @apaszke, this dependency on `builtins` causes issues if `future` is not installed.  Can you add it to setup depedencies?

```
Successfully installed torch-nightly-1.0.0.dev20181017
Cleaning up...

    import builtins
```
